text:
Pinnacle Response is one of the original body worn
camera suppliers based here in the UK.

Recently we've got a lot more involved
in the software side of things

and the management
of the secure data in the cloud.
We are really quite a small business,

but we have very high goals,
very high expectations.

So traditionally body worn cameras
downloaded or offloaded their footage

onto a local hard drive, and really that's
not a very secure way of doing things.

What we find is that
using our DEMs software

in the cloud and AWS environment
is the perfect solution for that.

All of the footage
that we record is encrypted.

It takes a lot of resource
to unencrypt those files.

This is not a challenge within AWS
because the solution is fully scalable.

If there's 10,000 cameras
uploading data at any given time,
the system order scales to cope with that,

and the customer sees
no compromise in performance.

and the customer sees
no compromise in performance.

I couldn't say enough
good about these guys.

If we need support,
they bring a specialist in

and we get support
exactly for that specific topic.

We are actually in the process
now of rolling out, very shortly,
our next generation of camera.
Again, it's designed specifically to work

with our DEMs software
and with the cloud based deployment.
With AWS, we have the opportunity now
to scale up as much as we want.

We have the opportunity
to work in any country

that we specifically want
to. Really the world's our oyster now.
